title: How to unsubscribe from SiriusXM
description: SiriusXM subscriptions can be cancelled online, by phone, or through third-party app stores, depending on where you initiated your subscription. To avoid charges, cancel at least 24 hours before your renewal date. Note that audio subscriptions are non-refundable as of March 15, 2024.

web.title: Cancel SiriusXM Subscription via Website
web.description:
To cancel your SiriusXM subscription via the website:

*   Go to the SiriusXM website.
*   Log in to your account.
*   Navigate to the 'Manage My Account' section.
*   Follow the cancellation instructions provided on the website.
*   Confirm your cancellation to avoid future charges.

phone.title: Cancel SiriusXM Subscription via Phone
phone.description:
To cancel your SiriusXM subscription via phone:

*   Call 1-888-539-7474 to speak with a representative.
*   Confirm your cancellation to avoid future charges.

app_store.title: Cancel SiriusXM Subscription via App Store
app_store.description:
To cancel your SiriusXM subscription through the App Store:

*   Open the Settings app.
*   Tap your name.
*   Tap Subscriptions.
*   Select SiriusXM.
*   Tap Cancel Subscription.

google_play.title: Cancel SiriusXM Subscription via Google Play
google_play.description:
To cancel your SiriusXM subscription through Google Play:

*   Open the Google Play Store app.
*   Tap your profile icon.
*   Tap Payments & subscriptions.
*   Tap Subscriptions.
*   Select SiriusXM.
*   Tap Cancel subscription.

seo_text: Cancel your SiriusXM subscription online or by phone. Follow our guide to avoid renewal charges. Learn how to cancel SiriusXM subscriptions purchased through the App Store or Google Play.
